import pxToRem from'assets/theme/functions/pxToRem';var icon={defaultProps:{baseClassName:'material-icons-round',fontSize:'inherit'},styleOverrides:{fontSizeInherit:{fontSize:'inherit !important'},fontSizeSmall:{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(20)," !important")},fontSizeLarge:{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(36)," !important")}}};export default icon;
